Module src.c195classproject
Package helper

Class TimeZoneHelper

java.lang.Object
helper.TimeZoneHelper
public class TimeZoneHelper extends Object
Helper class used to convert time to and from local,ET, and UTC.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    DATE_FORMAT
    string constant used to set the formatter so LOCALDATETIME knows how to parse the strings
    static final DateTimeFormatter
    dtf
    used to parse string with the set DATE_FORMAT
